foreignData.name: Kartusche des Zusammenhalts
foreignData.text:

Wenn die Kartusche des Zusammenhalts ins Spiel kommt, erzeuge einen 1/1 weißen Krieger-Kreaturenspielstein mit Wachsamkeit.
Die verzauberte Kreatur erhält +1/+1 und hat Erstschlag.

foreignData.name: Cartucho de solidaridad
foreignData.text:

Cuando el Cartucho de solidaridad entre al campo de batalla, crea una ficha de criatura Guerrero blanca 1/1 con la habilidad de vigilancia.
La criatura encantada obtiene +1/+1 y tiene la habilidad de dañar primero.

mainBoard.name: Cartouche of Solidarity
mainBoard.originalText:
Enchant creature you control
When Cartouche of Solidarity enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token with vigilance.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has first strike.

rulings.text: Cartouche is an enchantment subtype with no special meaning. Other cards may care about which enchantments are Cartouches.

Each Cartouche is an Aura with "Enchant creature you control." If another player gains control of either the Cartouche or the enchanted creature (but not both), then the Cartouche will be enchanting an illegal permanent and be put into its owner's graveyard as a state-based action.
If the target creature becomes an illegal target before a Cartouche spell resolves, the spell doesn't resolve. It doesn't enter the battlefield.

mainBoard.text:
Enchant creature you control
When this Aura enters, create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token with vigilance.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has first strike. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

mainBoard.name: Trial of Solidarity
mainBoard.originalText:
When Trial of Solidarity enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +2/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn.
When a Cartouche enters the battlefield under your control, return Trial of Solidarity to its owner's hand.

rulings.text: Each Trial has an ability to return to your hand when a Cartouche enters the battlefield under your control. The Trial is returned to its owner’s hand only if it’s on the battlefield as the ability resolves.
If an effect allows you to exert a creature as it attacks, you may do so even if it has vigilance. It won’t be tapped.
Trial of Solidarity’s triggered ability affects only creatures you control at the time it resolves. It won’t affect creatures that come under your control later in the turn.

mainBoard.text:
When this enchantment enters, creatures you control get +2/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn.
When a Cartouche you control enters, return this enchantment to its owner's hand.
